title: Chocolate Milk Plus
description: Immediate post-practice recovery beverage with near-perfect carb-to-protein ratio and electrolytes.
instructions: Drink chocolate milk immediately after practice.
Eat banana alongside if very depleted.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Delivers 2–3:1 carb-to-protein ratio for optimal recovery
Fluid and electrolytes aid rehydration after heavy sweating
storage: Best consumed immediately; if prepared ahead, keep refrigerated and consume within 3–4 days.

title: Ready-to-Drink Protein Shake + Banana
description: Zero-prep combo to kickstart recovery within minutes of practice ending.
instructions: Drink the shake and eat the banana within 0–15 minutes post-practice.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Meets protein minimum while providing quick-digesting carbs
Portable for locker-room or car ride recovery
storage: Shelf-stable shakes: follow label; consume fruit same day.

title: Greek Yogurt Honey Cup
description: Simple, portable protein + carb combo for immediate recovery when kitchens aren't available.
instructions: Stir honey into yogurt and eat immediately.
wrestling_specific_benefits: 18g protein meets recovery minimums
Honey adds quick carbs to replenish glycogen

title: Protein Bar + Fruit
description: Grab-and-go option combining protein with simple carbs to begin recovery fast.
instructions: Eat immediately after practice with water or sports drink.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Meets protein minimum while refueling with carbs
Requires no equipment, ideal for bus rides
storage: Follow bar package date; fruit best same day.

title: Fig Bars + Protein Shake
description: Classic wrestling combo delivering the 2–3:1 carb-to-protein ratio in minutes.
instructions: Drink the shake; eat fig bars immediately after finishing.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Meets recovery macros with portable foods
Simple strategy athletes will actually follow
storage: Consume within the day; store shake per label.

title: Greek Yogurt Power Bowl
description: Balanced 2–3:1 carb-to-protein bowl with berries, honey, and granola for 15–30 minutes post-practice.
instructions: Layer yogurt, berries, honey, and granola; eat 15–30 minutes after practice.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Hits 2–3:1 carb-to-protein ratio
Simple and enjoyable so athletes repeat it nightly

title: PB&J Recovery Sandwich + Milk
description: Classic sandwich paired with milk to meet recovery macro targets in a practical, affordable way.
instructions: Assemble PB&J; drink milk alongside 15–30 minutes post-practice.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Affordable ingredients enable daily compliance
Balances refuel, repair, and rehydrate in one sitting
storage: Best same day; if prepped, refrigerate and eat within 24 hours.

title: Turkey Sandwich Recovery Combo
description: Lean turkey sandwich with fruit and water hits all 3 R's in a practical post-practice package.
instructions: Assemble sandwich; eat with fruit and fluids 15–30 minutes post-practice.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Protein meets repair needs without being too heavy
Carbs and fluids restore energy and hydration quickly
storage: Best same day; store turkey sandwich refrigerated and eat within 24 hours.

title: Cottage Cheese Recovery Bowl
description: High-protein cottage cheese base with simple carb add-ins for balanced recovery.
instructions: Spoon cottage cheese into bowl; serve with chips and vegetables.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Easy high-protein option for athletes not ready for heavy meals
Carb add-ins let families tailor to appetite

title: Hummus & Pretzels + Milk
description: Plant-forward recovery pairing adding protein and carbs with a hydration component.
instructions: Dip pretzels in hummus; drink milk alongside 15–30 minutes post-practice.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Combines carbs, protein, and fluids per 3 R's
Portable for immediate post-practice intake
storage: Keep refrigerated; consume dairy within 3–4 days.

title: Blueberry Chicken Wrap
description: Flavorful recovery wrap pairing lean protein with moderate carbs and hydration-friendly produce.
instructions: Mix yogurt, lemon, salt; spread on tortilla.
Layer chicken, greens, blueberries; roll tightly.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Protein + carbs fit the recovery ratio while staying light
Antioxidants support recovery from training stress
storage: Best same day; if prepped, refrigerate and consume within 24 hours.

title: Chicken Pasta Recovery Bowl
description: Classic carb + protein combination for complete 30–60 minute recovery meals.
instructions: Cook pasta; toss with oil, Parmesan, broccoli, and chicken.
Season and serve 30–60 minutes after practice.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Carbs refuel glycogen while protein repairs muscle
Simple flavors improve compliance after fatigue
storage: Keeps 3–5 days refrigerated or 1–2 months frozen. Reheat to 165°F.

title: Avocado Toast + Egg + Fruit
description: Modern recovery plate combining quality carbs, protein, and healthy fats with a fruit side.
instructions: Top toast with avocado and eggs; serve with fruit.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Meets 3 R's with simple, accessible ingredients
Flexible portioning for different hunger levels

title: Turkey Sandwich Recovery Plate
description: Lean turkey sandwich with sides designed for 30–60 minute recovery timing.
instructions: Assemble sandwich; eat with fruit and fluid 30–60 minutes post-practice.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Balanced macro profile for effective recovery
Portable and practical for families on the go
storage: Best same day; if prepped, refrigerate and consume within 24 hours.

title: Blueberry Recovery Bites
description: Make-ahead oat and blueberry bites for a gentle, portable recovery option.
instructions: Stir ingredients; portion into 6 bites; chill briefly before eating.
wrestling_specific_benefits: Gentle on stomachs while meeting recovery macro goals
Portable and kid-friendly for consistent use
